input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C 4.3" Dual SIM Android Smartphone (GSM Factory Unlocked) - Dual Core 1.2GHz CPU, 4GB, 5MP Camera, 3G 900/2100 MHz, International Version - White

Item specifications:
Quad Band 2G, 3G HSDPA 900/2100 MHz
Dual SIM Support, Dual Core 1.2GHz CPU, 4.3 Inch TFT capacitive touchscreen
768MB RAM, 4GB ROM, Support microSD Slot
5MP Rear Camera + LED Flash, with autofocus, Geo-tagging, touch focus
1800 mAh Battery, Bluetooth, GPS, WiFi, Android 4.3 Jelly Bean
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.
This cell phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C is a 4.3" Dual SIM Android Smartphone running on a Dual Core 1.2GHz CPU with 4GB of ROM and 768MB of RAM. The phone comes with a 5MP Rear Camera with LED Flash, autofocus, and touch focus, as well as a 0.3MP VGA Front Camera. It has a 1800 mAh removable Li-Ion Battery, and supports microSD memory cards up to 32GB. The Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C runs on Android 4.3 Jelly Bean and includes WiFi, GPS, Bluetooth, and 3G HSDPA 900/2100 MHz connectivity. Please note this phone is an international version and may not include a US warranty.
input_text.Response B: Introducing the Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C 4.3" Dual SIM Android Smartphone (GSM Factory Unlocked) in white! This international version phone comes unlocked, meaning it will work with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile, but not with CDMA carriers like Verizon and Sprint. It features a dual-core 1.2GHz CPU, 4GB of internal storage, and a microSD slot for expandable memory. The 4.3-inch TFT capacitive touchscreen display is perfect for browsing the web, checking your emails, or playing games. With a 5MP rear camera, LED flash, autofocus, and geo-tagging, you'll be able to take great photos and videos on the go. The phone also includes Bluetooth, GPS, WiFi, and Android 4.3 Jelly Bean. Please note that this phone may not include a US warranty and that some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones. It's important to contact the seller for specific warranty information.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
